meanings: [명사] hope, wish, [동사] hope, wish, desire, be hopeful, (기대하다) expect

vlive.korean: [(우왕 희망이 보인닷!)] - 쉽다 - 괜찮은데? [(Maybe this time?)] - Easy. - It's good. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[생일추카해 호석아 넌 우리의 영원한 희망] 생일 축하합니다! [Happy birthday j-hope you're our hope] Happy birthday to you! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 공공칠빵 소시지빵은 가라 호석오빵의 시대가 왔노라니,,🍞 (HAPPY J-HOPE DAY+1!)
vlive.english: [Happy birthday j-hope you're our hope] Happy birthday to you!

vlive.korean: 내가 희망이라고 - 형 희망이라고 했어? I said hope. - Oh, you said hope? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#335. 새옹_지마 (w. 최병찬, 이세진, 유리)
vlive.english: I said hope. - Oh, you said hope?

vlive.korean: 희망이 있어! 포기하지 마! There's hope! Don't give up! 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : [Wink Arcade] 박지훈 감자 획득 도전기 Lv.20
여러분들이 희망의 촛불이죠. You are the candle of hope. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: You are the candle of hope.

examples.korean: All his hopes began to crumble away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 모든 희망이 흔들리기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
